short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights some words on webpages, using internal customizable dictionary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this tool when you want some words to be highlighted on any web page you visit, by dotted underline, based on internal customizable dictionary. This tool has builtin support for three East Slavic Languages - Russian, Ukranian and Belorussian. You can add your own languages too, via settings.
